ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] Re: Lost Dugeons of Norrath
ygData.msgSnippet: Wow! You are a fortunate individual.  If I downloaded a game at work I d better have a resume ready! Sad thing is, I think our network would be great for LAN
ygData.messageBody:
Wow!
You are a fortunate individual.  If I downloaded a game at work I'd better have a resume ready! Sad thing is, I think our network would be great for LAN parties, what a waste :p

From: Enie [mailto:dawn_marie@...]
Sent: Thursday, September 11, 2003 10:41 AM
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [EverQuest] Re: Lost Dugeons of Norrath

Wooohooo! I brought my laptop to work and downloaded LDoN on the T1
line and it only took 27 minutes, far cry from 23 hours LOL. I am
headed home for lunch to play :)

--- In EverQuest@yahoogroups.com, Su <suceress@d...> wrote:
>
> Yeah. If you opt to get the
download only version you might want to
suck up
> to a friend to burn
copies of the files onto a CD and send to you.
> I was shocked when I
found a woman in the hardware store in this
small town
> who actually
plays EQ.
> luv,
> -Su
>
> Awhile back they had a patch
where you could opt to download it in
smaller
> chunks as they became
available...  all you had to do was click on
yes.
> This is
exactly what they were tryign to avoid because the network
traffic
>
ties up the bandwidth when people do this and nobody can connect.
>
> T1 will still take a good chunk of time, but not an entire day.
>
> Wulfric
>
>
>
>
